import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Heart, Search } from 'lucide-react'; import { mockWatchlist } from '../utils/mockData'; const Watchlist = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const filteredWatchlist = mockWatchlist.filter(stock => stock.symbol.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || stock.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const WatchlistCard = ({ stock }) => (

₹{stock.price}

{stock.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}₹{Math.abs(stock.change)}

({stock.changePercentage > 0 ? '+' : ''}{stock.changePercentage}%)

); return (

{/* Watchlist Grid */}

); }; export default Watchlist;
